articles.content: The 2024 class of edge rushers wont have a top-three draft pick like the 2023 class did with Will Anderson Jr. or the class before that with Travon Walker and Aidan Hutchinson. In fact, it probably w… [+12912 chars]

articles.title: Mahomes, Messi, LeBron highlight Colin's seven wonders of the sports world | THE HERD - The Herd with Colin Cowherd
articles.description: Colin Cowherd reveals his seven wonders of the sports world (Colosseum, Taj Mahal not included), including LeBron James, Leo Messi and Shohei Ohtani. Who are...
